item.title: 'Whole' Telugu film industry to meet Telangana govt in crucial meet to ease 'soured' ties following Allu Arjun arrest - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Telugu Film Industry to Meet Telangana Government to Resolve Tensions After Allu Arjun's Arrest

Date: Dec 26, 2024
Source: Hindustan Times

The Telangana government and Telugu film representatives are set to meet to address tensions following the arrest of actor Allu Arjun linked to a tragic stampede.

  • A meeting is planned to improve relations between the Telangana government and the film industry.
  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a stampede resulting in a woman's death during the screening of his film, Pushpa 2.
  • The state government may adjust ticket prices based on film categories.
  • High-budget films could be significantly impacted by the new government policies.
  • There is a political controversy surrounding Allu Arjun's comments and the government's response.
"If implemented properly, the minister’s statement will have a huge impact on high-budget films..."

This meeting marks a critical attempt to mend the relationship between the film industry and the government, following serious incidents that have sparked public and political outcry.

item.title: Here is the list of Tollywood bigwigs meeting CM Revanth Reddy - 123telugu
item.description:
Tollywood Bigwigs Meet CM Revanth Reddy

Published on: Dec 26, 2024 10:42 am IST

The Tollywood film industry bigwigs are scheduled to meet with Telangana CM Revanth Reddy to discuss vital issues and challenges facing the industry.

  • Notable personalities attending include producers and actors such as Dil Raju, Allu Arvind, Venkatesh, and Nagarjuna.
  • The meeting aims to address current industry challenges and potential solutions.
  • Representatives from various associations, including the Directors’ Association and the Telugu Film Chamber, will be present.
  • The event is seen as critical for the future direction of the Telugu film industry.
All eyes will be on the meeting that could shape the future of the Telugu film industry.

This meeting is anticipated to bring together influential figures in Tollywood to collaborate on resolving pressing issues.

item.title: Inside the Kapoor family Christmas lunch: Raha cuddles with Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor poses with Neetu Kapoor and cousins - The Indian Express
item.description:
Inside the Kapoor family Christmas lunch: Raha cuddles with Alia Bhatt, Ranbir Kapoor poses with Neetu Kapoor and cousins

Date: December 2024 Source: The Indian Express

The Kapoor family gathered for their annual Christmas luncheon, celebrating togetherness with moments of joy and laughter. Despite some family members being absent, the event showcased warmth through shared experiences and photos.

  • Three generations of the Kapoor family celebrated Christmas together.
  • Touching moments were shared, including Raha cuddling with her mother Alia Bhatt.
  • Prominent family members like Kareena Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan were missed due to holiday plans abroad.
  • Alia Bhatt shared glimpses of the festival at her parents’ home as well.
  • Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt are set to reunite on screen in the upcoming film Love and War.
“Hi!” Raha greeted the paparazzi with a flying kiss, melting hearts everywhere.

The gathering highlighted the importance of family and festive traditions, reinforcing the Kapoor family’s bond despite physical absences of some members.

item.title: Squid Game Season 2: Countdown to grand premiere begins; Cast, plot, episodes, where to stream, Season 3 - The Times of India
item.description:
Squid Game Season 2: Countdown to Grand Premiere Begins

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The much-anticipated Season 2 of Squid Game is set to premiere soon, building excitement among fans. Here’s everything you need to know about the upcoming season, including cast details, plot insights, episode count, where to stream, and hints at a potential Season 3.

  • The premiere date for Squid Game Season 2 is approaching.
  • Key cast members are returning, alongside new additions.
  • The plot will continue to explore the dark themes of the first season.
  • Fans can expect a total of 8 episodes in Season 2.
  • The season will be available for streaming on Netflix.
  • Discussion of a third season is already underway.
“Prepare for more intense games and unexpected twists!”

This upcoming season promises to retain the gripping narrative style that captivated viewers worldwide.

item.title: Guntur Kaaram special shows – Tickets sold out in seconds - 123telugu
item.description:
Guntur Kaaram special shows – Tickets sold out in seconds

Published on Dec 26, 2024 | Source: 123telugu.com

Superstar Mahesh Babu’s "Guntur Kaaram" was released on January 12, 2024, with high expectations. While his performance impressed viewers, the film did not fully meet fans' expectations, receiving mixed reviews. Now, the movie is back in the spotlight with a limited re-release in Hyderabad, where five special shows have been planned for the last day of 2024. Four shows are already sold out, demonstrating the film's growing popularity.

  • The movie stars Sreeleela, Meenakshi Chaudhary, Prakash Raj, Ramya Krishnan, and Rao Ramesh.
  • Produced by Haarika & Hassine Creations, featuring music by Thaman.
  • Fans are eagerly anticipating the re-release in theaters, showcasing a strong fan base.
“This demonstrates the strong fan base for Mahesh Babu and the film’s growing popularity.”

The limited re-release of "Guntur Kaaram" indicates its enduring appeal and the excitement among fans, especially after receiving a decent response on OTT platforms.

item.title: Deepika Padukone Shares Glimpse Of Daughter Dua’s First Christmas, Says ‘My Heart Is Full’ | Photo - News18
item.description:
Deepika Padukone Shares Glimpse Of Daughter Dua’s First Christmas, Says ‘My Heart Is Full’

Date: December 26, 2024 Source: News18

Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh are celebrating their daughter Dua's first Christmas. Deepika shared a heartwarming photo on Instagram, expressing her joy.

  • Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh welcomed their daughter, Dua, on September 8, 2024.
  • The couple shared a glimpse of Dua’s first Christmas on social media.
  • Deepika's Instagram caption read, “My heart is full.”
  • The couple held a meet-and-greet with paparazzi to introduce Dua, requesting no photos until they approve.
  • Deepika and Ranveer prohibited cameras at the meeting to protect their daughter's privacy.
“Dua Padukone Singh ‘Dua’ : meaning a Prayer. Because She is the Answer to our Prayers.”

This festive moment showcases Deepika and Ranveer's love for their child and their commitment to maintaining her privacy.

item.title: Baby John box office collection Day 1: Varun Dhawan starrer fails to beat Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' at tick - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Collection Day 1: Varun Dhawan starrer fails to beat Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' at ticket windows on Christmas Day

Publication Date: December 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

Varun Dhawan's new film 'Baby John' struggled at the box office on its opening day, failing to outperform the competition from 'Pushpa 2'.

  • 'Baby John' was released on Christmas Day, a strategic date for box office success.
  • The film's opening collections were significantly lower than those of 'Pushpa 2'.
  • Analysts note that 'Pushpa 2' continues to dominate in ticket sales and audience reception.
"Despite high expectations, 'Baby John' did not manage to capture the audience's interest like 'Pushpa 2' did."

The competition between the two films highlights the evolving dynamics of the box office during the festive season, which is crucial for major releases.

item.title: Waiting for Squid Game 2? Here’s when it streams on Netflix - 123telugu
item.description:
Waiting for Squid Game 2? Here’s when it streams on Netflix

Published on Dec 26, 2024 7:00 am IST

Back in 2021, Netflix took the world by storm with Squid Game, a survival thriller that became a global sensation and the most-watched Netflix series ever. Now, after much anticipation, the sequel – Squid Game 2 – is finally releasing today!

  • Fans have been eagerly waiting to see how the creators have reimagined the intense life-and-death game.
  • Many stayed up late, refreshing their screens, hoping to catch the premiere at midnight, but it won’t be available until 1:31 PM IST.
  • Squid Game 2 will stream in multiple languages, including Telugu, with a total of seven episodes.
Attention players:
12:01 a.m. PST
3:01 a.m. EST
5:01 a.m. BRT
8:01 a.m. GMT
9:01 a.m. CET
1:31 p.m. IST
5:01 p.m. JST
5:01 p.m. KST
#SquidGame2
— Squid Game (@squidgame) December 26, 2024

Fans are encouraged to revisit Season 1 while waiting, as the sequel promises another binge-worthy ride.

item.title: Dhirubhai Ambani International school fee structure: Here's how much Shah Rukh Khan, Aishwarya and other cele - India.com
item.description:
How Much Do Celebrities Pay for Their Kids' Tuition at Dhirubhai Ambani International School?

Date: December 21, 2024

Source: India.com

India is home to prestigious schools known for their quality education. Dhirubhai Ambani International School (DAIS) is prominently attended by many celebrity children. This report outlines the tuition fee structure for this elite institution.

  • DAIS is located in Mumbai and was established in 2003.
  • The school offers programs under the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education and the International Baccalaureate.
  • Tuition fees range from approximately Rs 1.4 million for kindergarten to Rs 2 million for Grade 12.
  • Aishwarya Rai and Abhishek Bachchan reportedly pay Rs 4.5 lakh monthly for their daughter Aaradhya's education.
  • The fee structure varies: Rs 1.7 lakh annually for Class 1-7, Rs 5.9 lakh for Classes 8-10, and Rs 9.65 lakh for Classes 11-12.
"Dare to Dream… Learn to Excel" is the motto of DAIS, focusing on holistic development and learning.

DAIS represents a significant choice for many celebrity families, reflecting the costs associated with high-quality education in India.

item.title: Richa Chadha calls Bollywood imaginary: 15 families from Bandra to Goregaon think of themselves as Bollywood | Exclusive - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Richa Chadha and Ali Fazal talk about their first home production, Girls Will Be Girls, which released on Amazon Prime Video last week.

Date: Dec 26, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Richa Chadha and Ali Fazal have ventured into production with their film, 'Girls Will Be Girls'. Released on Amazon Prime Video, the film explores a schoolgirl’s struggles between academics and her first love.

  • Girls Will Be Girls premiered on Amazon Prime Video after successful screenings at various festivals.
  • Richa comments on the imaginary nature of Bollywood, emphasizing the limited perspective of a few families.
  • Ali shares challenges in securing financing for the film, highlighting the investment mentality of backers.
  • The film is directed by Shuchi Talati and stars Preeti Panigrahi, Kani Kusruti, and Kesav Binoy Kiron.
“I feel Bollywood itself is very imaginary. Fifteen families between Bandra and Goregaon think of themselves as Bollywood.” - Richa Chadha

This production signifies a shift in the film industry, highlighting how streaming platforms are allowing diverse narratives to flourish.

item.title: Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 26, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Love and Relationship Horoscope for December 26, 2024

Date & Source: December 26, 2024

On December 26, 2024, the horoscope offers insights into love and relationships for each zodiac sign, encouraging self-reflection and open communication.

  • Aries: Embrace nostalgia to reflect on relationship patterns.
  • Taurus: Speak your truth to foster deeper connections.
  • Gemini: Express desires candidly within relationships.
  • Cancer: Confidence leads to flirtation and attraction.
  • Leo: Self-discovery enhances romantic connections.
  • Virgo: Taking breaks can rekindle romance.
  • Libra: Set love goals and dreams together.
  • Scorpio: Collaborate with friends for relationship insights.
  • Sagittarius: Reflect on growth in love journeys.
  • Capricorn: Face truths to deepen intimacy.
  • Aquarius: Small adventures can revitalize relationships.
  • Pisces: Infuse creativity for light-hearted connections.
“Love expands when it is fed with creativity and lightness.”

The guidance for today encourages individuals to embrace their feelings, communicate openly, and explore new experiences with partners or potential love interests.

item.title: Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 26, 2024 predicts no ailments - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pisces Daily Horoscope Today, December 26, 2024 to know your astrological predictions. No major illness will trouble you today.

Source: Hindustan Times

The Pisces daily horoscope for December 26, 2024, highlights a day free of major ailments. It emphasizes resolving past issues, maintaining good financial and health conditions, and the importance of interpersonal relationships.

  • General health is good with no major ailments reported.
  • Financial prosperity is anticipated.
  • Focus on resolving personal and professional challenges.
  • Singles may meet someone special; extra care needed in relationships.
  • Career opportunities abound for students and professionals in creative fields.
  • Encouragement to invest wisely and launch new ventures.
“No major illness will trouble you today.”
“Pay attention while walking or using a staircase.”

In conclusion, Pisces individuals are set for a generally positive day with good fortune in finances and health, coupled with career opportunities.

item.title: Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College: 'When She Became A Teenager.. - News18
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Regretted Rejecting Shraddha Kapoor After Seeing Her In College: 'When She Became A Teenager'

Date: December 25, 2024 Source: News

Varun Dhawan and Shraddha Kapoor, both from Bollywood families, have been friends since childhood. Varun recalls a childhood incident where he rejected Shraddha's affection, leading to humorous altercations with her young admirers.

  • Varun describes Shraddha's childhood crush on him when they were eight.
  • He recalls being beaten up by a group of boys at her birthday party for rejecting her.
  • During their teenage years, Varun realized Shraddha's beauty during a dandiya event, leading to feelings of regret about his previous rejection.
  • Both actors have collaborated in films 'ABCD 2' and 'Street Dancer 3D'.
“When Shraddha became a teenager, she had become extremely beautiful. That day, I regretted turning her down.” - Varun Dhawan

This playful recounting of childhood memories sheds light on the long-standing friendship between Varun Dhawan and Shraddha Kapoor, highlighting the transformative nature of young love and nostalgia.

item.title: Allu Arjun's dad gives 2 crore cheque to boy injured in stampede - The Times of India
item.description:
Allu Arjun's dad gives 2 crore cheque to boy injured in stampede

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

In a heartfelt gesture, the father of actor Allu Arjun has donated 2 crores to a young boy who was injured in a recent stampede. His support aims to aid in the boy's recovery and ensure he receives the necessary medical assistance.

  • The donation was made directly to support the boy's medical expenses.
  • Allu Arjun's family has a history of philanthropy and community support.
  • The incident highlights the ongoing need for awareness and support for victims of such tragedies.
“We hope this contribution can make a difference in the boy’s life,” said Allu's father.

This act of generosity is a reminder of the impact individuals can have in the lives of those affected by unfortunate events.
